cleaned_text: About Us The Spiritual Detox Shop(SDS)is a holistic healing and spiritual guidance company that focuses on helping individuals detox the mind, body, and spirit. We offer all natural holistic healing products and instruments to assist in detoxing, healing, and replenishing our clients from the inside out. We also offer sound healing, light body activation, reiki, and meditation sessions to aid individuals in their detox journey. Our efforts to cultivate experiences (events/retreats) globally has assisted in raising the vibration of the collective and the planet. This beautiful SDS Ombre Crystal Bowl Chakra Set was created with the intention to assist in blending the beautiful tones which attune and align each chakra.
